text: int arr [ 100 ] [ 100 ] , n , i , j ; int main ( ) { int sum = 0 , t ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & arr [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } j = 0 ; i = 0 ; sum = sum + arr [ i ] [ j ] ; while ( i < n ) { if ( arr [ i + 1 ] [ j ] >= arr [ i + 1 ] [ j + 1 ] ) sum = sum + arr [ i + 1 ] [ j ] ; else { sum = sum + arr [ i + 1 ] [ j + 1 ] ; j = j + 1 ; } i ++ ; } printf ( "\n%d" , sum ) ; } return 0 ; }
